name: Wallet (OCAP)
description: Ethereum wallet tools backed by the OCAP kernel daemon. The AI agent can check balances, send transactions, and sign messages without accessing private keys.

ocapCliPath.description: Absolute path to the ocap CLI entry point (.mjs file or binary). Default: 'ocap' from PATH.

walletKref.description: Kernel reference of the wallet coordinator (e.g. 'ko4'). Found via `ocap daemon exec getStatus`.

timeoutMs.description: Timeout for daemon calls in ms (default: 60000)
